channel.title: Seo-gu on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: Jeongseojin, a new memory destination that touches the boat - Seo-gu, Incheon, Korea
item.description:
Species hanging on the sunset wall

Jeongseojin, a new memory destination that touches the boat

Seo-gu, Incheon, Korea

The end is strangely connected with memories. On the extension line of the familiar space, 'the end' creates vague memories. Gangdong's Jeong Dong-jin has long since become a pronoun for making memories, and Jang Heung's Nampo Village's Jeong Nam-jin has also been covered with the story behind the movie <Festival>, increasing the number of people. A new memory spot was created not far from Seoul. This is Jeong Seo-jin, Seo-gu, Incheon.

Jeong Dong-jin and Jeong Nam-jin mean a seaside narrator located in the east and south of the country, starting from Gwanghwamun, Seoul, where former kings lived. Therefore, Jeong Seojin is the end of the Gwanghwamun and the narrator. Jeongseojin coincides with Gwanghwamun's road sign, latitude 37 degrees 34 minutes 08 seconds, toward the west side, and is exactly 34.526 km from Gwanghwamun.

West end of Gwanghwamun, connected to the tidal flat of Yeongjongdo

You may be wondering that Jeong Seo-jin's story has been rising recently. Jeong Seo-jin is connected to the starting point of Gyeongin Ara Waterway. It is a tourist attraction discovered in Seo-gu, Incheon since 2011 in connection with the opening of Gyeongin Ara Waterway. If Jeongdongjin is filled with train stations and wide sandy beaches, and Jeongnamjin has a strong outlook of a secluded fishing village, Jeongseojin looks somewhat unfamiliar with a boat gate and passenger terminal.

If you arrive at Jeong Seo-jin in anticipation of your vague muzzle level, the atmosphere of the neatly refurbished surroundings will approach you. The wind turbines rotating round and round, towering observation decks, and museums that have been remodeled for retirement traps are the first to catch the eye. Below the Yeongjongdaegyo Bridge, the tidal flat spreads out smoothly, and the plane floats and descends over Yeongjongdo. The milestone that informs Jeong Seo-jin is somewhat in between.
Jeongseojin and Yeongjongdaegyo Bridge

The fact that Jeong Seo-jin is still less known in the world can be experienced in local people's message. Even the employees at work and those who came to ride a bicycle on the Arabaetgil have a strange expression on the presence and symbol of Jeong Seo-jin.

Seojin Seo Coverstone
tablet...
The symbolic sculpture of Jeong Seo-jin, who encounters in a large space with a mixture of a square and a marina, is a sunset shaped like a white stone. Noeuljong takes the form of a pebble created by the high and low tide on the west coast. You can see the sunset between the sunset and the sunset when the tide spreads, but this sunset has the meaning of “start” rather than “the end”.
The sunset wall is next to the sunset. The outdoor wall, hanging from a small piece of paper, is an experience space where visitors to Jeongseojin carve memories and new departures.
Sunset
The sunset wall is constructed so that the bell can be hung on the wall containing six themes: love, happiness, hope, excitement, friendship, and romance. It is a scene similar to hanging a lock on a memory spot in the world. The species actually has a variety of writings. The piano engraved on the floor of the sunset wall buzzes various sounds related to the sea.
The writings of the sunset wall
Behind the glow wall, there is a signpost of Jeong Seo-jin in the upper part of the sun, and colorful pinwheels turn behind the Yeongjongdaegyo Bridge.
Poet Jeong Ho-seung sang "Seo-Jin Jin" in a fertilization that stands in a space facing the sea.
Seojin Seo from the observation deck

Friend
Stop tears and come to Jeongseojin
Put your hands on each other's shoulders and tenderly
Look at the red horizon of Jeongseojin, the sunset
How could there be a sunrise without sunset
How can the stars shine without the sun setting?

Wooden deck walkway and wind power generator
Love Story in Jeong Seojin
Jeong Seo-jin's added luck is not only the geographical location, but also the story behind it. Jeong Seo-jin was called 'Jang Moru' in the Goryeo Dynasty. Travelers from the southern region to Gaekyung, the royal road of Goryeo, stayed for a day. At that time, the legend that the son of a grand daughter living in Jeolla-do stayed here in Yeogak (ryokan) as he went to see the past. Based on this legend, Seo-gu Office in Incheon recommends using Jeong Seo-jin as a couple's proposal space or a place to swear love.
Even if you can't see the sunset, there are quite a few places to swear love. Next to the plaza, a wooden deck walkway is formed along the waterway, and beside it, the wind power generator runs beautifully. The Ara Tower observatory overlooks the Arabaetgil and Yeongjongdo tidal flats at a glance.
Hamsang Park
There is a cafe on the upper floor of the observation deck. This café is a bit expensive, but it is the best point to see the most dramatic sunset. The space on the other side is an outdoor deck, and the scenery facing without a window is superior to this.
Ara Tower and Ara Waterway
Hamsang Park and Bicycle Path
Jeong Seo-jin also has small spaces for families, which encourage spring outings. Hamsang Park, which meets on the Arabaetgil, is a space that has been relocated from the marine guards retired after 30 years of active activities. ‘Haekyung 1002 ship’ is a legendary trap that played an active part in the West Sea ferry sinking and the Cheonan ship crew rescue before decommissioning.
The Ara Waterway Exhibition Hall, located on the first floor of Ara Tower, also provides a variety of spaces for real-world experiences. Admission to Hamsang Park, observation deck, and experience hall is free.
Traveling to Jeongseojin is convenient by using the Airport Railroad to Geomam Station. It is connected to Seoul Station, Gongdeok Station, and Hongik University Station, and it can be reached in 20-30 minutes. From Geomam Station, you can transfer by a circular bus. Ara Waterway You can reach Jeongseojin, where the cruise ship is moored, by bicycle. Bicycle rental is also available at Jeongseojin Square. When the sun goes down, a quartet performance will be held at Noeuljong, and the Haenam Festival will be held on the last day of each year.
Tourists riding bicycles
Travel information

Seojin Jeong
Address: Jeongseojin Plaza, Arinecheon Terminal, Gyeongin Ara Waterway, Seo-gu, Incheon
Contact: 032-560-5930

www.정서진.com


1.Access

* Self-driving

Incheon Airport Expressway Cheongna IC → Cheongna Economic Zone → Arlinecheon Terminal

* public transport

Get off at Geomam Station on Incheon Airport Railroad, and use the circular bus 77-1

2. Restaurants around

Cafe Ara: Pizza, Steak / Seoin Gyeongin Ara Waterway Arincheon Terminal Observatory 24F / 032-564-4501
Chief: Eel, Chueotang / 16 Gyeongmyeong-daero 263beon-gil, Seo-gu / 032-568-7738
Evenly: Han Jeongsik / 386, Seunghak-ro, Seo-gu / 032-569-4886

item.title: The sea I want, it's all there. Busan Songdo Marine Cable Car - Seo-gu, Busan, Korea
item.description:
Walking on the sea, flying in the sky, all the seas we want

The sea I want, it's all there. Busan Songdo Marine Cable Car

Seo-gu, Busan, Korea

If you open Facebook or Instagram some time ago, there are photos that make up social media. A sea cable car in Busan Songdo, which runs through the cool sea against a blue sky and white clouds! Even the picture alone made my stuffy chest pierced. There is a reason to go to Busan, so there is no need to hesitate. I just booked a train ticket.
The seas of Busan we know are about Haeundae, Gwangalli, and Taejongdae. Song-do? His head is smiling with a question mark. But it is reverse. The middle-aged parents' generation hit Songdo first, rather than Haeundae. Turning the time back 50 years ago, the best beach in Busan in the 1960s is the Songdo Beach. At that time, Haeundae couldn't even give out a business card, so Songdo is visible again.
Songdo Beach with fine sand and indigo sea
Songdo Beach was opened in 1913. It holds the title of Korea's first public beach. When Songdo Beach was in full swing, there were four specialties. Cable cars, bridges, diving platforms and cruise ships. The nation's greatest reputation began to fall due to environmental pollution in the 1970s. In 1987, the typhoon Selma was overwhelmed, the bridge and the diving platform collapsed completely, and the cable car stopped operating the following year.
Songdo Beach installed in Turtle Island
Songdo is now regaining its glory. The cable car began to fly again, and a nice cloud trail over the bridge was placed over the sea. In the middle of the sea, a large turtle-shaped diving platform appeared, as well as a promenade along the sea that was not available in those days, making Songdo's day more full.
Songdo Beach has regained its old reputation
11:00 Walk on the sea, Cloud Trail
Songdo Beach, the superstar of the old year, was crushing at first sight. I love the dazzling blue sea and the wide, fine beaches that look like a half moon. People who plunge into the sea and are walking along the waves crashing in the white, regretting the summer going, each enjoys Songdo Beach.
A cloud trail with the sea spreading on both sides
The small island on the eastern end of the beach is Turtle Island. A cloud trail runs across the sea past Turtle Island. A shelter in the shape of a ship is decorated at the entrance, and in the photo zone of the bow, there is a lover who creates the scene of the movie Titanic. As you enter the promenade, the sea spreads smoothly on both sides. Looking to the right is the sea, and looking to the left is the sea. Even down the sea is visible. The bottom of the bridge is made of tempered glass, so the sea is soft. It is literally a scene where a miracle walks on the sea.
Taste the miracle of walking on the sea
Total length is 365m. It is a sufficient distance to enjoy the sea in a relaxed manner. Turtle Island has small attractions such as turtle sculptures, and it is good to take a break from the sea breeze. After passing the turtle island, the promenade stretches 100m towards the sea. At the end, I'm dyed to the depths of my chest.
Now it's time to go take the cable car offshore, but Mount Geumgang is also around. Not far from the Cloud Trail, there is a 100-year Songdo Alley. Inside the alley, there are various restaurants from old wheat noodles to new pasta houses.
Turtle Island in the middle of the cloud trail
13:00 Flying over the sea, Songdo Marine Cable Car
If you push it, it will quickly remove the subtraction and finally take the marine cable car. I was in agony for a while before riding. Riding a regular cable car or a crystal cruise with a transparent bottom. Aside from the fear of heights, I chose Crystal Cruise. After spending a lot of time in a long line of realization of popularity, I finally climbed the cable car.
Landscape 100 points excitement
"Wow ~ I'm killing the sea landscape." "It's amazing!" Gyeongsang-do's exclamation with us is not going to stop. In short, you can forget about the cable car you've taken so far.
The best feeling to carry over the sea
The cable car, which is transparent to the floor in a panoramic view made of glass everywhere, seems to burst beyond thrill. In the distance, Busan Tower and Namhang Bridge can be seen at a glance, and clouds in the sky pass by.
Busan Tower and Namhang Bridge at a glance
The moment I see the dark sea at my feet, I feel like a superman flying in the sky for a while. The scenery score and thrill score are both perfect.
Crystal cruise with transparent bottom
The Songdo Marine Cable Car boasts a total length of 1.62 km and a maximum height of the marine cable car of 86 m. The open sea scenery is the best. When you get off at Songdo Sky Park (Upper Station), there is the Skyha Version Observatory.
Songdo scenery seen from Skyha version observatory
The view of Songdo Sea, the sky and the cable car flying over it can be seen at a glance. Songdo Doppel My World, located on the 1st basement floor, is a cable car museum where you can see the history of Songdo Cable Car at a glance. The first cable car and the latest cable car are placed side by side, and you can also experience a vivid VR experience like riding a sea cable car.
The first cable car and the latest cable car
15:00 Meet the scenery of 100 million years along the sound of waves, Songdo Coastal Trail
There is a coastal walkway from Amnam Park with an upper stop to Songdo Beach. You can use a round trip, but that is why you bought a ticket one way. The Coastal Trail is a designated spot for Busan National Geopark. You can walk along the deck path and see the sedimentary rocks accumulated 100 million years ago. The sound of waves lays in the background while meeting the plump geology and admiring the open sea. It takes 30 minutes to reach the Songdo Beach, but it is difficult to resist the temptation when you meet the way down the middle and middle coast. When many ships are immersed in the landscape of the Songdo coast where they anchored, it is timeless.
Songdo Coastal Trail created over a billion years of sedimentary rocks
There was no dazzling trail in the sea, an exhilarating cable car in the sky, and rumors that the night scene would kill him, but I pledged to the next and went home.
Songdo Coastal Trail
Travel information

Songdo Marine Cable Car (Busan Air Cruise)

-Address: 171 Songdo Haebyeon-ro, Seo-gu, Busan

-Inquiries: 051-247-9900

http://www.busanaircruise.co.kr/

item.title: 4.5 billion Asian festivals! Compete for over 3000 medals in 36 events
item.description:
Opening ceremony of the 17th Incheon Asian Games

4.5 billion Asian festivals! Compete for over 3000 medals in 36 events

Seo-gu, Incheon, South Korea

On September 19, the 17th Incheon Asian Games started with the opening ceremony of Incheon Asiad Main Stadium in Incheon, Korea. 45 Asian countries, including Korea, China, and Japan, compete for over 3000 medals in 36 sports (28 Olympics and 8 Olympics) including basketball, rugby, archery, weightlifting, swimming, canoeing and boxing. The event, which includes all members of the Asian Olympic Council (OCA), including North Korea, will be held for 16 days until October 4. The third Asian Games to be held in Korea is the third after Seoul in 1986 and Busan in 2002. As of 2014, only Thailand (4) and South Korea have hosted more than three Asian Games.

Departure begins at the opening ceremony of Incheon Asiad Main Stadium on September 19, 2014
Before looking at the full schedule, let's take a look at the Incheon Asiad Main Stadium, which was completed for the Incheon Asian Games. It boasts a floor area of 11,620m2 (approximately 34,000 pyeong) and five floors and more than 60,000 seats. The competition started with the opening ceremony of Incheon Asiad Main Stadium. It is held in Incheon and Suwon Gymnasium (Handball), Munhak Park Tae-hwan Swimming Pool (Swimming). If you're a sports fan, it's a good idea to check the location of the stadium to create a line.
Opening Ceremony of 2014 Incheon Asian Games
A game of over 3000 medals. How should we look? Since we cannot introduce all the schedules, we arranged the schedules focusing on handball, swimming, archery, and gymnastics games loved by Koreans, mainly soccer, baseball, and basketball.
Opening Torch Light

First of all, the soccer became fun until the 2002 Korea-Japan World Cup. The final will take place at the Literature Stadium on October 2. In the soccer qualifiers held on September 21st, the Korean men's team beat Laos 2-0 and the women's team beat Maldives 13-0. Baseball, which started on the 22nd, won 15-0 against Thailand. The semi-finals and finals will take place on the 27th and 28th after the match against Hong Kong on the 24th. All take place at the Literary Baseball Stadium. Basketball is scheduled to play against Jordan at the Samsan World Gymnasium on the 25th. On the 28th, the quarter finals will be held at the Hwaseong Stadium.

Kim Young-Soo Chairman, Organizing Committee, Asian Games
Match schedule? It's not difficult!

Marine Boy Park Tae-hwan's swimming game is not to be missed. On the 21st, they won bronze medals in the men's freestyle 200m final and the men's freestyle 400m final on the 23rd. The freestyle 100m preliminaries are scheduled for 9 am on the 25th.

Gymnastics Fairy Son Yeon-jae will compete in the rhythmic gymnastics individual qualifiers on October 1 at Namdong Gymnasium. The rhythmic gymnastics consists of four events: ribbon, ball, club and hoop. There was a medal in gymnastics. On the 23rd, Lee Sang-wook won the bronze medal in the Men's Gymnastics Men's Final, and Yun Na-rae added another bronze medal in the Women's Individual Final. On the 24th, Yang Hak-sun will play in the final match of the gymnastics men's floor exercise, and will play against Li Segwang of North Korea. Gymnastics is the exercise of postponing body movements using machines. Express stability, difficulty, elegance and originality. Men's sports are Maru, Cheolbong, Parallel Bar, Massage, Ring, Chopping Board, and Women's Floor, Average Bar, Double Parallel Bar, Chopping Board.
Traditional medallion archery. The Republic of Korea breathes on a single arrow that cuts off the target. Archery won eight gold medals, including the 2014 Incheon Asian Games and the newly added compound. In the men's group qualification round (compound) held on the 23rd, Choi Yong-hee (2nd) and Yang Young-ho (5th) played in the men's individual qualification round. The women's team also took first place in the Compound Women's Qualifying Round and Choi Bo-min (1st) and Seok Ji-hyun (2nd) in the individual qualification round. The game is played every day until the 28th.
Wait here! There are two types of archery: a recurve bow and a compound bow. All archery we have seen in the meantime is recurve. Compound archery hasn't been an Olympic or Asian competition. However, attention has been increasing as it was adopted as a regular sport since the Incheon Asian Games. What is the difference between the two? As the name implies, the bow structure is different. If the recurve is a traditional bow, the compound is a mechanical bow. The recurve is heavy and sensitive, so the player's concentration is important. Thinking of the archery field in the meantime makes it easier to understand. Compounds, on the other hand, are lighter and smaller than mechanical arrowhead recurve arrows that are easy to learn for beginners with pulleys and sights.
In the finals of the badminton men's team where the opposition hero Lee Yong-dae played on the 23rd, he added a gold medal. The men's and women's mixed singles and doubles games will be held until the 29th. In addition, medal competitions will be held in 36 events including judo, shooting, cycling, and land. As of September 24, 2014, South Korea is ranked second overall with 61 medals, including 20 gold, 19 silver and 22 bronze.
Judo Qualification
Indeed, don't forget the seal of three children, Vichuon, Barame, and Chumyeon, the mascots of the Incheon Asian Games. The mascot of the convention has influenced the image of the competition. As the name suggests, the eldest son of the Incheon Asian Games, Bichuon, is, as the name suggests, 'the messenger of light shining hope on the whole world'. Was taken from. Why don't you enjoy the festival of autumn, wind, light and wind?
Panoramic view of Literary Park Tae Hwan Swimming Pool
Travel info

Incheon Asiad Main Stadium
Address: 806, Bongsu-daero, Seo-gu, Incheon (Yeonhee-dong)
Contact: 032-458-2014

http://www.incheon2014ag.org/
